content.raw:
I tried to handle backward compatibility in 7d8f060. Could you give it another spin?

Since we can’t tell what version of the plugin was used to record the log files, I simply check if the URI prepended with the playback path exists. If it doesn’t exist, then playback assumes that the file was recorded using an older version, and the playback log path is not prepended. In this case it just would leave the path alone as `~/.ignition/fuel/...`.

I tried to handle backward compatibility in 7d8f060. Could you give it another spin?

Since we can’t tell what version of the plugin was used to record the log files, I simply check if the URI prepended with the playback path exists. If it doesn’t exist, then playback assumes that the file was recorded using an older version, and the playback log path is not prepended. In this case it just would leave the path alone as ~/.ignition/fuel/....
